mapper.insert: insert into member (m_email, m_passwd, m_seckey, m_name, m_tel, m_regdate, m_delstatus) values(#{m_email}, #{m_passwd}, #{m_seckey}, #{m_name}, #{m_tel}, sysdate, 'N')
mapper.select: select * from member where m_email=#{m_email} and m_delstatus='N'
mapper.update: update member set m_name=#{m_name}, m_tel=#{m_tel} where m_email=#{m_email}
mapper.select: select * from member where m_email=#{m_email} and m_name=#{m_name} and m_delstatus='N'
